Wow, just wow. This game really blew my mind. The story line is amazing. it really draws you in. The sadistisch humour really is the cherry on the cake of awesomeness. the only insignificant downside is that the challenge rooms don't have any 'story dialogue', so you'll gain nothing more than a headache.

It is so much fun!!! It can be challenging,It can be sad. But the ending is the best:) buy it and ENJOY! Ps.Im still alive.

Я пропустил Portal, когда он вышел в свет, и решил к нему вернутся именно в тот момент, когда был готов к концепции игры. 
Я не знаю, как у VALVE получилось наделить душой казалось бы, невоодушевленную игру, словно по волшебству, Portal на столько затягивает своей непосредственностью, что на протяжении всех 3-х часов, за которые игра была пройдена, получил подлинное наслаждение. Чего только стоит сюжет, которого как бы нет, но который как бы цепляет, хах. 

Я рекомендую рандеву с одинокой ГЛэДос абсолютно всем, обаяние и чувство черного юмора которой, не сможет оставить равнодушие в ваших глазах.

You should play portal because of the puzzles, the amazing physics, and, of course, GLaDOS, Turrets,  good storyline, lots of lore if you look hard enough, and portal guns!

Sensacional! Um jogo puramente de raciocínio. Exige lógica e, em alguns momentos, um pouco de agilidade pra poder avançar no game. Apesar de curto, vale (muito) a pena conferir! Ah, e a música no fim também é bem legal. xD

Portal is quite possibly the most topsy-turvy 3D Puzzler you'll ever try! The Idea is simple, run through the test chambers and complete it... with portals! This physics game forces you to think dynamically about every avaliable space within your environment. Learn how to fling yourself through the air, avoid turrets, and more as you're led through the entire Apperature Sience facility by the antagonistic A.I. known as gLaDoS, who's dialog alone will have your sides split and begging for the next test (scalples not included). If you have not yet played this amazing game, do it now! There will be cake!
A break through in puzzle games. Start thinking with portals!
its not as fun as portal 2 but you need to play this first i recomend getting the portal bundle pack

Ah, Portal, the sleeper hit of the Orange box. What a refreshing take on shooters. A puzzle game that no others can rival. The humor and atmosphere in this game are fantastic.

PLAY IT.

What can I say about Portal? This is the best puzzle game of all time, and with GLaDOS making her snarky comments throughout the game, the humor is great as well.
Крутая игруха у кого есть 200 р можете покупать!

One of the best games of all time, and one of my favorite games ever. To complete the campaign will take approximately two hours, but there's so much to explore in the game. The achievements pushed me to explore the campaign further, complete the advanced stages, and attempt the challenge missions. I found the advanced stages tough but doable. The challenge missions are a little too difficult for me to ultimately complete after all these years. I also really enjoyed going through the developer quotes in the stages and hearing their experiences. If you're still reading this review and not putting your purchase information into Steam, you're taking way too long to make a simple decision. Buy it! Highly recommended! Get the sequel while you're at it. Whatever you do, play the game!
Não da pra não jogar!!

Nifty little 3D puzzle game with lots of character and humor.

Though incredibly short, this is one of the most fun games I've ever played. The concept of portals is intuitive and adds a new level of design to solving puzzles or even just getting from one end of a room to another. The foreboding atmosphere and hilarious voice acting make this a must own. Beatable in a couple hours, but with loads of replay value.

First steam game I ever owned.

Pretty good, feels a lot more like an experimental Half-Life 2 mod which is pretty much what it is when you get down to brass tacks.  It's short & sweet, and even though Portal 2 is, on a technical level, a far more fleshed out & ambitious experience, there is a unique unsettling atmosphere in this game that works extremely well with the early Source engine, juxtaposed by the pristine white sterile environments you encounter.

[h1]8/10[/h1]

fun game JUST so much fun sloveing the test champers its amagazing game where you can use portals to help in tests as you trave though them you learn whats going on and see in the backgrounds and learn your not the only one there geting hints from the "rat man" is always nice as you do your tests and find a way out of the building a must have only one i could say is better then portal is portal 2 my god but rember you must play this before portal 2 or you wont understand a thing anyhow i give this 6stars out of 5 stars just amagazing =)

Portal is amoung the greatest games I have played, a title shared by less than 5 games across all platforms.  It is much shorter than Portal 2, but can provide at least a few hours puzzles for a rainy afternoon.  I normally don't enjoy puzzle games, but this will appeal to anyone.  Worth the $10, in my opinion, but really isn't long enough for more than about $5.  Buy it during the next Steam sale, you won't regret it.  Better yet, buy the bundle of both Portal games.

文句なしに誰にでもお勧めできる論理パズルゲーム。「ポータル」というワープゲート作成装置を駆使して物理法則を使ってゴールを目指す３Dアクションパズル、というと取っつきにくく感じるが、さわればすぐに直感的に遊べる。落下した勢いでワープゲートに突っ込んで、真横に大ジャンプ！等非常に感覚的にわかりやすく、ステージも次第にルールを覚えられるように練られている。海外メーカーの作品とかPCゲームとかFPSとかやったことないという人にこそおすすめしたい。
物理法則を使うということ、FPSの主観視点であること、全部がきちんと要素として活用されている。やったことのない人、苦手だと思っている人にほどこれは勧めたい。パズルゲームとしてもFPSとしても文句なしの金字塔だと思う。
The Cake is a lie, but the hype for this game is NOT.
Portal is a unique game that tests your mental skills to the limit with close-to-impossible test chambers! A brilliant and immersive game, also try Portal 2!
Chell has a big butt.

Вторая часть была гораздо круче, в этой первой ещё и автоматизированный компьютер-комментатор по имени GLaDOS была слишком "компьютерна", суха, совсем не эмоциональна была (сильные эмоции у неё проявились уже ближе к концу игры). Можно сказать, что первый Portal - это просто тест идеи (хотя самый первый тест идеи с порталами был в бесплатной игре [b]Narbacular Drop[/b]).

Ещё к первой части можно скачать бесплатные любительские моды вроде [b]Portal: Prelude[/b]. Я тут посмотрел, штук 10 крупных модов вышло, но я в них почти не играл ещё. (Играл и прошел только Prelude и TFV Mappack). Эти 2 мода посложнее оригинала, но играть в них интересно, советую после прохождения кампании, если вам не надоело, пройти и их.
Super addictive!!!
Spent 2 hours trying to kill the rocket turret because I thought it was GLaDOS >-<;

ВНИМАНИЕ! СПОЙЛЕРЫ!

Давным-давно! Когда я любил фирму valve за Налфу 2 и ждал второго эпизода, появилась нашумевшая байка об игре. где можно было прыгнуть в пол и выпасть из потолка, сделав там и там дырку - "ПОРТАЛ".
Это должна была быть игра с незамысловатым названием ПОРТАЛ.
  И она вышла! ОНА ВЗОРВАЛА МНЕ БАШКУ! Как так? бесконечные тоннели прямо между двух стен? Закон сохранения энергии, "ЧТО БЫСТРО ВЛЕТАЕТ, ТО БЫСТРО И ВЫЛЕТАЕТ".

А какова история самих персонажей... которых там всего 2 с половиной. Некая Челл, девушка испытуемая? Глэдос - робот и мозг всей лаборатории.
История неясная, такая запутанная. такая требующая продолжения!
its da fun

Um dos melhores jogos da Valve. História muito legal, surpreendente, e deixa um gostinho de quero mais. Jogabilidade muito boa, física bem interessante, e texturas leves, joga com resolução full tranquilo. A história está diretamente relacionada a Half-Life, então se você gostou de HL, jogar este vai te matar um pouco das saudades enquanto não sai HL3. Pra provar que você não precisa matar ninguém pra se divertir em um jogo =D

This is a triumph! 
Huge success!
It blows. No replay value. I only played it once and i beat it and that was it. I have no need to play it again.

This game actually makes you think...

10/10

Трехчасовое развлечение пролетит незаметно, завершившись великолепной песенкой и оставив приятное впечатление. Довольно однообразный геймплей и отсутствие NPC компенсируются портальной пушкой, благодаря которой можно выделывать потрясающие трюки, и обворожительной GLaDOS.
A great mind bending challenge. Playing with Portals never gets old, and I know I can always download the game for a good bit of fun.

Richtig gutes Spiel , gute Story , gut zum Lets Playen , aber für 10 Euro ist es meiner Meinung ein bisschen zu teuer , weil das Spiel kann man in 1Std. und 30Min. durchzocken. Trotzdem empfehlenswert! :)

This is the best game ive played in a while! This is a really good puzzle game and is also good for thinking. The best part of the game is the end. If you want to find out about the end and find out what makes this game amazing then play it for youreself.

I can't believe I have never played this game until now. It is a great adventure with a very nice story that develops so wonderfully as you progress in the game. Puzzles are pretty easy if you are a puzzle person; otherwise, it can take a little while.
Muy interesante, y diferente a lo visto.

Come si definisce un gioco che fa epoca, un gioco che cambia le prospettive, un gioco che da una svolta alla storia del medium? Si definisce un capolavoro. Questo è un corto capolavoro. E' un piccolo gioiello targato Valve(...)è come un puzzle visto dall'interno. Si gioca cadendo, rimbalzando, interagendo con oggetti per superare il livello, arrivare all'uscita. Avete solo tre armi a vostra disposizione: la forza di gravità; una pistola in grado di "sparare" sulla superficie di fronte, uno alla volta, due portali che comunicano fra di loro; il vostro cervello. E' così semplice? Si, così semplicemente immensamente difficile.Il motore grafico (...) nonostante l'età fa uno splendido lavoro. Il suono è studiato nei minimi particolari(...)La trama(...) è coinvolgente(...)I dialoghi(...)sono semplicemente divini. E la complessità, oh la complessità è un bijou. La sfida intellettuale(...)è allo stesso tempo gratificante e profondamente stancante.(...)fatevi un favore e compratelo, ad occhi chiusi. (Rece completa sul mio sito)

If you haven't played this game yet, your life is incomplete.

Get it and start thinking with portals.

10 Out of 10
Excelente jogo. Uma experiência única.
Kurzweiliger Rätselspass der Lust auf Mehr macht!
El mejor juego de puzzles hasta la fecha; innovador, adictivo, carismático, inteligente y cuidado hasta el último detalle para que pueda envolverte por completo.

Já virou um dos meus chavões: Se você nunca jogou Portal, jogue Portal.

Mesmo após todas as piadas sobre bolo serem usadas à exaustão, Portal ainda é um jogo a se jogar, porque é mais do que o seu humor. O design de fases é um dos mais bem ajustados e corerentes que já vi e a mecânica de portais, embora não pareça uma ideia relativamente normal, implica em diversas sutilezas que tornam o jogo único.

Considero uma das experiências fundamentais a se ter com videogames. É um jogo de duas horas ou menos que rende muito mais do que isso em reflexões e discussões.
Originale e divertente. Un pò corto, ma è giusto così.
Чудова гра! Як і її продовження!

The best out of the two. i suggest you only buy portal and not portal 2. hate the way portal 2 constantly holds your hand throughout the game. ie showing you where you need to go and what to do ~ where as portal does not, it lets you figure things out like a boss.
Gra jest świetna. Ale i krótka. Dlatego też, w duchu gry, nie będę rozpisywał.

Una experiencia en visión subjetiva distinta. Un juegode lógica muy divertido y con toques de humor muy geeks. 100% recomendado.

感谢valve制作了这么精彩的一款游戏，也要感谢上帝让我遇见了它，当然我不是信徒只是借用一下，相信上帝不会介意的
传送门的创意实际上并不新颖，但是以这样的方式表现着实令人眼前一亮
在安排关卡上，制作组费尽心思。当我在完成了前十八关，以为游戏就要结束了的时候，才发现正相反——游戏刚刚开始，我只不过完成了教学部分而已

制作组为这样一个诡计解密的游戏设计了精巧、幽默但又简单的剧情，AI操着机械化的语音忽悠玩家，手段拙劣得让人一眼就能看穿，但是还在一本正经地放不下架子，令人捧腹
尤其是最终关，连哄带骗加威胁
原本以为所有的语音和最后的歌曲都是由软件合成的，没想到却是真人配音加上后期处理制作的，真是难为了配音演员了

强烈推荐在完成了游戏之后再玩一遍开发者注释模式，能看到制作组的设计思路、测试改动、历史版本的介绍，还有AI配音演员的评论——别放过任何一个小房间，里面都可能会有彩蛋注释
Messed with my head at times but enjoyed it all the way through.
